tool_description: Evaluates external transfer credits against degree requirements and determines which credits can be applied toward the student's program.

transfer_institution.description: Name or code of the institution where credits were earned

transfer_courses.description: Array of course codes or titles from transfer institution

transfer_credits.description: Array of credit hours for each transfer course

transfer_grades.description: Array of grades earned for each transfer course

target_program.description: Degree program code for credit evaluation

minimum_grade.description: Minimum grade required for credit transfer (default: C)

max_transfer_credits.description: Maximum number of transfer credits allowed

error_messages: Array length mismatch: transfer_courses, transfer_credits, and transfer_grades must have equal lengths.
Institution not recognized: The transfer institution is not in the approved institutions database.
Invalid grade threshold: minimum_grade must be a valid letter grade (A, B, C, D, or F).
Credit limit exceeded: Requested transfer credits exceed the maximum allowed for the program.
Invalid evaluation type: evaluation_type must be 'exact_match', 'equivalent', or 'elective'.
Course equivalency not found: Unable to find equivalencies for one or more transfer courses.
Below minimum grade: Some transfer courses have grades below the required minimum.
usage: Provide student information, transfer institution details, course information, and target program. The tool evaluates which credits can transfer and how they apply to degree requirements.

total_credits_accepted.description: Total number of transfer credits accepted

accepted_courses.description: Array of transfer courses that were accepted

rejected_courses.description: Array of transfer courses that were rejected

equivalent_courses.description: Array showing how transfer credits map to institutional requirements

remaining_requirements.description: Array of degree requirements not satisfied by transfer credits
